text: 3.8: Zo 8.33; 8.39Gu guigira nde nzuai, nde guigira ndavi domdorgip, nde Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tɨvir muuŋri. Nde mba tɨvir muunga, nde ndavi domdorgi tɨvi mba ti. Nde maaŋ muuŋ thav, thaŋ nzuav fhura khaŋ wari ga nzuai, ‘Nza Abrahaman nzɨgi ma.’ Gu guigira nde nzuai, Fhe Bakɨme vuzvuk ma. Ana vuzvugirga, ana ntige kha ŋkɨɨr gumgi tharir muuŋgirga, mba gumgi mbe Abrahaman nzɨgi kɨrga.
